text: (nam'mutaiya attatcikalai evarkalukku) muntiyavarkalum poyppittatait tavira (veru etuvum ivarkal korum) attatcikalai anuppa nam'mait tatukkavillai (itarku mun) nam'samutu' kuttattarukku oru pen ottakattaik kankutana attatciyakak kotuttiruntom; avarkalo (varampu miri) atarku aniyayam ceytanar; (makkalai) accamutti eccarippatarkave anri nam (ittakaiya) attatcikalai anuppuvatillai
